extDesc.message: Preview thumbnail images on Twitter with the shift key.

pageCont_summary_1_1.message: This Chrome extension make you be able to preview thumbnail images quickly on Twitter.

pageCont_usage_1_1.message: You can preview thumbnail images to press

pageCont_usage_1_3.message: key while hovering your mouse over.

pageCont_usage_2_1.message: You can also close the preview to release

pageCont_usage_3_1.message: It will open the image source as a new tab to select

pageCont_usage_3_3.message: menu item while you are previewing.

pageCont_notworking_1_1.message: If you reload this extension while Twitter page has been opened, you may get an error when previewing.

pageCont_notworking_2_1.message: In this case, you can solve the error to reload the page.

pageCont_contact_1_3.message: if you have a report of bug or unfair use, question, request, etc.

pageCont_fromdever_1_1.message: Thank you for using Twitter Image Preview.

pageCont_fromdever_2_1.message: I created this extension in about two days so that can preview images without clicking.

pageCont_fromdever_3_1.message: I hope you like it, and would be glad if you share this extension with your friends.
